product_name: Life is good Sleep Pants - Boys' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Life is good(R) Sleep pants are made of brushed polyester fabric that's washed for softness and offers breathable comfort. He'll love the style, fit and feel of these sleep pants. Elastic waistband with drawcord secures the waist; relaxed fit. Closeout.
